page.title: 16Shouldham-A day at school.5
page.content: On Wednesdays the juniors have games. In the winter term the girls play Netball and the boys Football.Fincham boys come over and join with us.We also do Cross Country Running on Mondays.Mrs.Rochford,Mrs.Hipperson and Vivienne Swift take us to the Warren where we jog or run about 2 miles. In Science this year we have been looking at our senses and we all had various tests to do on each other. Dr. Garner gave us colour vision tests to do.We have also looked at energy and how we are using up the world's supply of fossil fuel.We tried making a windmill and as it was a windy week most of us managed to make one that would work.We also use a BBC Computer and have lessons from TV and radio. Earlier this year there was a break-in -our computer equipment was stolen.The insurers gave us the money 6wks later.
